name: Beyond the Mountains Demo 1.2
description:
BEYOND THE MOUNTAINS is a top-down action RPG that combines the exploration of Zelda with the zaniness of Twin Peaks. It is set to release on Steam in early 2023.

A STRANGE LAND

When Peter awakens in a strange land, he discovers the truth about himself as he attempts to save the world from certain peril.

EVERY INCH UNCOVERED

Use every item you can find in dungeons to map an entire world full of secrets. With dozens of enemy types and hundreds of puzzles, you will have to use every trick in your arsenal to save the world.

A COLORFUL CAST

The world of Evalon is stocked with colorful and crazy characters, each with their own desires and motivations. It never hurts to talk to each person you meet.
